sentences.sContent: Because if you don't have any fresh ideas, then you use stale tactics to scare the voters.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because if you don't have any fresh ideas, then you use stale tactics to scare the voters.
sentences.sCn: 因为，如果没有任何新鲜的想法，你就用一些陈腐的战术去恐吓选民。

sentences.sContent: By using stale metaphors, similes, and idioms, you save much mental effort, at the cost of leaving your meaning vague, not only for your reader but for yourself.
sentences.sContent_eng: By using stale metaphors, similes, and idioms, you save much mental effort, at the cost of leaving your meaning vague, not only for your reader but for yourself.
sentences.sCn: 使用陈腐的暗喻、明喻和习语，你省了不少思考的力气，代价是你的意义的模糊，不仅对读者，也对你自己模糊。

sentences.sContent: ...but you need to do some self-assessment to determine where you have become stale in your thinking...
...All the advice and public-service announcements about the value of an education that used to sound stale now ring true...

synos.tran: 变陈旧；撒尿；变得不新鲜

remMethod.val: s ＋ tale(传说) → 传说说多了就不新鲜了 → 不新鲜的； 陈腐的
